review: This has been the best thing we purchased on Amazon. I love the ability of watching Netflix in our bedroom and all the options on Amazon Prime. This has been a great alternative to buying a smart TV. Works great. Easy to use and set up. WIFI connectivity has been working fine. Also paired the App on my iPhone to it. Works well. Only had an issue once with it not connecting. I still have Comcast XFINITY box in my room. You can have both on the TV, each on its own HDMI.My mom also bought one after seeing mine. We have two in the house, the next floor up and no problems with connectivity with two in the house.
